selectToolHeader: Click on a tool below to draw on the map
createMarkerHeader: Drag your marker to reposition it
createPolylineHeaderInitial: Click anywhere on the map to start drawing
createPolylineHeaderContinueOrFinish: Click to continue drawing, or double click to complete your line
createPolygonHeaderInitial: Click anywhere on the map to start drawing
createPolygonHeaderContinueOrFinish: Click to continue drawing, or click on your first point to complete your shape
editMarkerHeader: Drag your marker to reposition it
editPolylineHeader: Drag line handles to edit your line, or click on line handles to delete vertices
editPolygonHeader: Drag shape handles to edit your shape, or click on shape handles to delete vertices
